com.hybris.cis.ext.tax

Class MyTaxServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.ext.tax.MyTaxServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CisService, TaxService

    public class MyTaxServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaxService
    Sample implementation of TaxService for demonstration purposes. Demonstrates usage of the executor pattern for the "quote" service method.

        Throws:
        ServiceErrorResponseException - with UnkownServiceExceptionDetail if the cart date is equals 1996\01\23

      • adjust

        public CisTaxDoc adjust(CisOrder order)
        Description copied from interface: TaxService
        Adjusts a previously created invoice. The order should contain the line items that need to be removed from the invoiced tax doc. This function is typically used for the case where line items are returned.
        Specified by:
        adjust in interface TaxService
        Parameters:
        order - example order to be adjusted
        Returns:
        an accepted tax doc with doc id equaling cart id

      • exists

        public CisTaxDoc exists(java.lang.String docId)
        Description copied from interface: TaxService
        Checks if a specified invoice already exists.
        Specified by:
        exists in interface TaxService
        Parameters:
        docId - a document id to be checked for existence
        Returns:
        an accepted tax doc with doc id equaling the passed id, stating the existence of the document
